sqlMap.statement: SELECT Msg AS "MSG" , MsgCtnt AS "MSGCTNT" , TreatMatrCtnt AS "TREATMATRCTNT" , SMSSendYn AS "SMSSENDYN" , ITSMObstclGrdDstcd AS "ITSMOBSTCLGRDDSTCD" FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIBP05 WHERE MSG = #msg#
UPDATE $schemaId$.TSEAIBP05 SET MsgCtnt = #msgCtnt# , TreatMatrCtnt = #treatMatrCtnt# , SMSSendYn = #smsSendYn# , ITSMObstclGrdDstcd = #itsmObstclGrdDstcd# WHERE Msg = #msg#
INSERT INTO $schemaId$.TSEAIBP05( Msg, MsgCtnt, TreatMatrCtnt, SMSSendYn, ITSMObstclGrdDstcd ) VALUES(#msg# ,#msgCtnt#, #treatMatrCtnt#, #smsSendYn#, #itsmObstclGrdDstcd#)
